title: How to buy 2018 NA LCS Summer Finals tickets
body: We’re excited to head to NorCal for the 2018 NA LCS Summer Finals at Oracle Arena in Oakland, CA on September 8-9. Here’s everything you need to know to purchase tickets for Summer Finals:

replies.body:
> All prop firearms are prohibited by Oracle Arena.
> All prop bow-type weapons are prohibited by Oracle Arena.
> All prop swords or imitations of bladed weapons are prohibited by Oracle Arena.
> All prop staffs or poles are prohibited by Oracle Arena.

So you're saying lamp posts are okay?
I like the joke, but actual answer- no. It's considered a "pole"

omg.  Angler Jax has a REEL WEAPON.

I just got the joke!  {{champion:99}}
Where is the update on what merch will be there? The list for last year’s summer finals was nice to have!
What exactly are the "Outdoor activations" that begin at 11AM? Is it meant to say activities or..?
Glad to see it so close but my god you could not have chose a worse arena. A walmart parking lot would be a more beneficial venue.
Sadly I live on the other side of the country, but I can't wait to watch online either way! :D
Can't wait to see the post titled "Update: Summer Finals Tickets" just like Spring Finals :)
